alert.note: Alert for York (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:26PM CDT until May 12 at 7:15PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern York County in east central Nebraska... * Until 715 PM CDT. * At 626 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Gresham to near Utica to near Beaver Crossing to near Friend, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * These severe thunderstorms will remain over mainly rural areas of eastern York County, including the following locations... Thayer. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 357 and 365. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
